Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Upper Egypt; Thebes, Deir el-Bahri, Temple of Hatshepsut, forecourt, Foundation Deposit 4 (D), MMA 1923–24
Medium: Wood, bronze or copper alloy, leather
Dimensions: l. handle 27.9 cm (11 in); l. blade 16 cm (6 5/16 in); w. handle 4.6 cm (1 13/16 in)
Provenance: Museum excavations 1923–24. Acquired by the Museum in the division of finds, 1925.
